name: Caretaker
text: Hey, *! Well, now that you are here as per my request,

name: Caretaker
text: Would you be able to eradicate all 9 pests in the bush?

name: Caretaker
text: Once you have gotten all 9, I'll meet you at the end of the trail!

name: Caretaker
text: I'm feeling a little sick today, so you're a real one
